channel.title: audiobulb podcast
channel.description: Our focus is on quality, detail, intricacy and emotionality within music. The sounds from our artists embrace glitch and groove, acoustic manipulation, environmental ambience, microsounds and idiosyncratic beats.
channel.itunes:subtitle: exploratory music
channel.itunes:author: Audiobulb Records
channel.itunes:summary: Our focus is on quality, detail, intricacy and emotionality within music. The sounds from our artists embrace glitch and groove, acoustic manipulation, environmental ambience, microsounds and idiosyncratic beats.

item.title: Audiobulb Sampler Mix
item.description: Based in Sheffield, UK Audiobulb have their eye on the world of upcoming & established artists producing groundbreaking electro-acoustic releases. This showcase mix by David Newman demonstrates the breadth, beauty and quality of the label’s latest offerings. Jimmy Behan - Through The Trees Biosphere - Tranoy Lighthouse Ultre - Peace Corpse Craque - Navfrakure - Supple NQ - And On Some Other Night Mark Harris - Last Days Hans van Eck - Rivers He Can Jog - Suite Part 1 & 2
item.dc:creator: Audiobulb Records
item.itunes:summary:
Based in Sheffield, UK Audiobulb have their eye on the world of upcoming & established artists producing groundbreaking electro-acoustic releases. This showcase mix by David Newman demonstrates the breadth, beauty and quality of the label’s latest offerings.

item.title: Bulbcast-008
item.description: 1. room - your open face 2. ultre - phrotos 3. he can jog - too weak, too weak is the king's bow 4. calika - every colour 5. build - moriane 6. oti - one day in may, 1998 7. build - composition 1 M 8. calika - swan song 9. nomad palace - some of their backs were frozen
